en.name: Dodoco Tales
en.passiveDescription: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Charged Attack DMG by {{16//20//24//28//32%}} for 6s. Charged Attack hits on opponents increase ATK by {{8//10//12//14//16%}} for 6s.

zh.name: 嘟嘟可故事集
zh.passiveDescription: 普通攻击命中敌人后的6秒内，重击造成的伤害提升{{16//20//24//28//32%}}；重击命中敌人后的6秒内，攻击力提升{{8//10//12//14//16%}}。
